title: Esther (Meyerowitz opera)
text: Esther is a 1956 English-language <a href="opera">opera</a> by <a href="Jan%20Meyerowitz">Jan Meyerowitz</a> to a <a href="libretto">libretto</a> by <a href="Langston%20Hughes">Langston Hughes</a> based on the biblical story in the <a href="Book%20of%20Esther">Book of Esther</a>. The opera was premiered at the Festival of Contemporary Arts at the <a href="University%20of%20Illinois%20at%20Urbana%E2%80%93Champaign">University of Illinois at Urbana–Champaign</a>.
